comments_since_last_sample.body:
As a reminder, this subreddit [is for civil discussion.](/r/politics/wiki/index#wiki_be_civil)

In general, be courteous to others. Debate/discuss/argue the merits of ideas, don't attack people. Personal insults, shill or troll accusations, hate speech, any suggestion or support of harm, violence, or death, and other rule violations can result in a permanent ban. 

If you see comments in violation of our rules, please report them.

 For those who have questions regarding any media outlets being posted on this subreddit, please click [here](https://www.reddit.com/r/politics/wiki/approveddomainslist) to review our details as to our approved domains list and outlet criteria.

***


*I am a bot, and this action was performed automatically. Please [contact the moderators of this subreddit](/message/compose/?to=/r/politics) if you have any questions or concerns.*
In other news, Orange Imbecile can't get out of his own way

Prediction:

Nothing was written that could actually result in prison time for Trump. As stupid as he is, I really don't think he's so dumb to write down a goddamned criminal conspiracy to overthrow the election through a riot. 

However, the material will make clear that there was no genuine belief that the election was actually stolen. It'll be clear that Trump was attempting, through legal or illegal-but-non-justiciable mechanisms to overthrow the will of the people. It'll be clear that a number of Republicans supported these plans.

In response to these findings, Liberals will denounce the actions of Trump as clearly villainous. Republicans will not give a shit.
Aides note: “This guy is a fucking moron.”

If you possess the ability to read between the lines, this is essentially an admission of guilt. 

Unfortunately, not many Trump supporters have that skill in their wheelhouse.

"Guilty. Guilty, guilty, guilty."- Random fish in the jury from the Spongebob Squarepants Episode; "Krabs vs Plankton"

-Season 4

Plankton slips on a puddle of water, uninjured. He comes up with a plan to fake a injury and sue Mr. Krabs for not putting out a wet floor sign.

EDIT: I've always wanted to use that quote. It's one of my many favorites from that show.

EDIT 2: Those phone calls most likely hold the truth, the WHOLE TRUTH, and nothing BUT THE TRUTH, SO HELP ME GOD.

EDIT 3: The Episode is Krabs vs Plankton. Oops!

Trump also wants to exert executive privilege over former White House press secretary Kayleigh McEnany s binders “principally relating to allegations of voter fraud, election security, and other topics concerning the 2020 election.”

Other documents include handwritten note from Meadows' files "listing potential or scheduled briefings and telephone calls concerning the January 6 certification and other election issues" and “a draft Executive Order on the topic of election integrity.”
Lol. Says the guy that he has absolutely nothing to hide.
Of course he does, the fucking criminal.
